item.title: ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’ Director Responds to Speculation That Jennifer Love Hewitt and Freddie Prinze Jr. Didn’t Shoot Together
item.description: Sony’s feature reboot from filmmaker Jennifer Kaytin Robinson hit theaters over the weekend.
